title: ENCODE Lab
description: Schema for submitting a lab or research group for the ENCODE project.

schema-version.description: The version of JSON schema files used in the generation of the example
schema-version.comment: Must match the specific schemas' `version` property

name.description: Unique short name for the Lab
name.title: Lab Name

pi.comment: For automatic submission submit the email, first & last name, or collegue uuid for the PI
pi.title: P.I.

awards.description: List of Awards (Grants) associated with the lab (and the ENCODE project).
awards.title: List of Awards (Grants)

items.description: Award (Grant) this submission is registered under
items.comment: Automatic submitters can supply an Award UUID, name, or number
items.title: Award Name or Number

institute_label.description: Short name for the Institute the lab belongs too.
institute_label.title: Institute Label

institute_name.description: Full name for the Institute the lab belongs too.
institute_name.title: Institute

city.description: City in which the lab is located.
city.title: City

state.description: US State, Province or Region in which the lab is located.
state.title: State/Region

country.description: Country in which the lab is located.
country.title: Country

postal_code.description: Postal Code for the lab's mailing address
